name: Moar_Powah
description:
Moar_Powah is about Ryoku a lost robot on a depleted planet that is trying to survive as his energy source is ticking down. He has to be very careful because with every attack his energy is depleted. Ryoku must carefully farm energy and level up before he can take on the large evil robots roaming this desolate planet.

WASD to move

J to melee

K to shoot laser

Spacebar to respawn
